summary: net/sched: act_ct: fix ref leak when switching zones
details:
net/sched: act_ct: fix ref leak when switching zones

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit bcbf4e5c3b5b373cd61528392dd1ec8e9c0fd33d, it was introduced in version v5.15.26 by commit a95ea90deb3071c1ded77a05e91cfebc5238d908. For more details please see the references link.
